function.name: 例子
function.db2: select yhid_pk from xt_zzjg_yh_new where sfyx ='0' and yhzh='${0}'
function.oracle: select yhid_pk from xt_zzjg_yh_new where sfyx ='0' and yhzh='${0}'

function.name: 例子
function.db2: select GZ_DM_JCDM.JC_DM_DM,GZ_DM_JCDM_FX.JCSJFX_DM,GZ_DM_JCDM_FX.JCSJFX_MC from GZ_DM_JCDM,GZ_DM_JCDM_FX where GZ_DM_JCDM.JC_DM_ID = GZ_DM_JCDM_FX.JC_DM_ID order by GZ_DM_JCDM.JC_DM_DM,GZ_DM_JCDM_FX.JCSJFX_DM
